title: Archive: Portugal v England - Euro 2004
body_text:
Archive: Portugal v England - Euro 2004

Relive an agonising quarter-final defeat for England in Euro 2004 as they are beaten by the hosts Portugal on penalties in Lisbon.
Watch Portugal v England from Euro 2004 in full on iPlayer.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
